title: exception triggered with mlflow ui: AttributeError: 'NoneType' object has no attribute 'search_model_versions'

labels.name: area/model-registry
labels.description: Model registry, model registry APIs, and the fluent client calls for model registry

body:
(mlflow --version is 1.5.0)
In the web-based ui, by accessing the url of a run:
```
2020/01/19 13:06:02 ERROR mlflow.server: Exception on /ajax-api/2.0/preview/mlflow/model-versions/search [GET]
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/home/francesco/deepfake-detection-challenge/venv/lib/python3.7/site-packages/flask/app.py", line 2446, in wsgi_app
    response = self.full_dispatch_request()
  File "/home/francesco/deepfake-detection-challenge/venv/lib/python3.7/site-packages/flask/app.py", line 1951, in full_dispatch_request
    rv = self.handle_user_exception(e)
  File "/home/francesco/deepfake-detection-challenge/venv/lib/python3.7/site-packages/flask/app.py", line 1820, in handle_user_exception
    reraise(exc_type, exc_value, tb)
  File "/home/francesco/deepfake-detection-challenge/venv/lib/python3.7/site-packages/flask/_compat.py", line 39, in reraise
    raise value
  File "/home/francesco/deepfake-detection-challenge/venv/lib/python3.7/site-packages/flask/app.py", line 1949, in full_dispatch_request
    rv = self.dispatch_request()
  File "/home/francesco/deepfake-detection-challenge/venv/lib/python3.7/site-packages/flask/app.py", line 1935, in dispatch_request
    return self.view_functions[rule.endpoint](**req.view_args)
  File "/home/francesco/deepfake-detection-challenge/venv/lib/python3.7/site-packages/mlflow/server/handlers.py", line 137, in wrapper
    return func(*args, **kwargs)
  File "/home/francesco/deepfake-detection-challenge/venv/lib/python3.7/site-packages/mlflow/server/handlers.py", line 581, in _search_model_versions
    model_versions_detailed = _get_model_registry_store().search_model_versions(
AttributeError: 'NoneType' object has no attribute 'search_model_versions'

```
